backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining storage, access control, data maps, and types for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, and activity tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components related to implementing blurred placeholder avatars for ribbits.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend files and pages.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global theme provider, and app layout structure.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks to show and update bookmark state.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty component file placeholder for comment item UI.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty component file placeholder for emoji reactions UI.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution including a heart icon and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search, navigation, create menu, user avatar, and mobile/desktop behavior handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the main navigation sidebar with active-route highlighting and recent activity items. Fetches recent activities and lily titles and displays navigation links for core app sections.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post card with metadata, counts, avatar, like/share actions, and optional tags. Fetches interaction counts, pond info, and user/pond avatar data.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Shows an image in a 4:3 frame, using a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 aspect ratios. Measures image ratio dynamically and supports click and lazy loading.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Wraps the left sidebar in a mobile drawer with overlay and body‑scroll locking. Opens and closes with transitions and renders the sidebar inside.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Displays pond information, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls. Fetches pond details, moderator profiles, and membership state.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders a mobile header for pond pages with banner, profile image, and tab navigation. Shows pond name, description, and switches between feed and about.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, linked lily title, and the comment content. Fetches avatar and post info and links to the conversation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a ribbit post with avatar, content, likes, and nested replies, handling like and reply actions. Uses queries for avatar, likes, and reply creation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Displays an avatar image with a tiny blurred placeholder and smooth transition once loaded. Supports avatar and plain img render modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using pond and lily query data. Renders skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions based on user input. Handles search submission, selection, and closing.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Desktop search dropdown showing trending searches or suggestions under the search bar. Allows selecting a term and hides when no results.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts using tag stats queries. Includes reusable tag stats module and list items.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for tab lists and triggers with underline-focused classes. Used to create consistent tab UI styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs using React state and localStorage with functions to query and modify bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given CSS media query matches using React state and matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend pond, user, and activity data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into compact notation such as k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side utility for validating, resizing, and compressing images, with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to alphanumeric lowercase, with error messages for invalid inputs.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes tags as alphanumeric lowercase, returning errors for invalid tags.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity and Froggy Phrase recovery using localStorage, including username generation, phrase hashing, backups, and restore logic.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-post cooldown tracking in localStorage to prevent repeated view count increments within five minutes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with platform description, key features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with loading states, membership indicators, and links to individual pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating new lilies with support for text, image, or link posts, tag suggestions, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Offers a form for creating new ponds with name validation, optional images, Froggy Phrase input, and image compression handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, avatar, posts, and comments with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with search, sorting, sidebars, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders a single lily with comments, likes, view tracking, and reply creation.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond info including moderators, visibility, creation date, and leave-pond actions.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond's feed of lilies with join actions, sorting, and responsive layout.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading states and removal options.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Renders the tag hub with tabs for top, trending, and newest tags, fetching data and displaying tag lists with skeletons and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows posts filtered by a specific tag with sorting, redirects to canonical tags, and displays tag metadata with sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Implements user settings for username changes, avatars, froggy phrase recovery, pond management, and admin tools using many queries and dialogs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for preserving layout while implementing blurred placeholder optimization for Ribbits.
